docna.cdata!:
Indonesia - Jakarta Sewerage And Sanitation
            Project : Loan 2236 - Loan Agreement - Conformed

display_title.display_title:
Indonesia - Jakarta Sewerage And
            Sanitation Project : Loan 2236 - Loan Agreement - Conformed

18212744.admreg: East Asia and Pacific,East Asia and Pacific

repnme.cdata!: Indonesia - Jakarta Sewerage and Sanitation Project

abstracts.cdata!:
The proposed project would be the first
            step in developing a sewerage system in Jakarta, and would
            complement the public health measures carried out under
            previous Bank-assisted urban development projects. Its
            principal objectives are to improve environmental conditions
            and public health, establish an institution and sound
            financial policies for the operation and management of the
            Jakarta sewerage system, and demonstrate the feasibility of
            appropriate low-cost technologies. The project would cover
            sewerage and sanitation improvements including: (a) a basic
            water-borne sewerage system; (b) drainage improvements; (c)
            sanitation improvements; (d) consulting services for project
            implementation, for technical, institutional and financial
            studies, and the preparation of future projects; and (e) training.

docna.cdata!: Indonesia - Jakarta Sewerage and Sanitation Project

display_title.display_title:
Indonesia - Jakarta Sewerage and
            Sanitation Project
